title: Plz mods help get my ticket noticed
body:
Hello, My name as you can see is solidpooh

What isn't so obvious is that my account is an NA account and it has been for years.

Tonight I tried logging in (to no avail.) yet, through some quick troubleshooting, discovered that my account was transferred to OCE using RP I had recently bought.

Currently I have a ticket up but just want to be sure I dont get counter hacked again and lose my account...

Could any mod speed up my process of getting my ticket recognised, my account safely transferred back and my RP refunded?

I didnt even log in yesterday at all, when it was the transfer took place

plz halp

replies.body:
Hey there,

Please understand that Player Support is currently very busy and tickets are backlogged, an initial response may take 48 hours or more.

Account security is important and your account will be locked as soon as the ticket is picked up to prevent any further unauthorised actions being taken to the account.

There is nothing we can do to assist you in speeding up a response to your ticket, but rest assured that Player Support will be on the case soon enough.

Thanks dude, I not only respect a response in general, But I double respect that sephiroth is telling me to hush up haha

FFVII Fo lyfe

I'll be patient

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
